group.label: Ethics approval and consent to participate
group.name: EthicsHeading

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The TWAS was undertaken using previously reported GWAS data. Hence, ethical approval was not sought for this project because all data came from the summary statistics from the published GWAS, and no individual-level data were used [CitationRef removed, CitationRef removed–CitationRef removed].

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no competing interests.
